page.title: 09The Schools in Hadleigh
page.content: Our School used to be in Threadneedle St. and these buildings were the secondary school,but a new upper school was built and we moved here.In fact the system was going to be changed and the new school was to be a middle school, our school becoming a first school.The plans were changed but both schools have suffered ever since with inappro- priate equipment.These buildings are completely unsuited to very young children and even with the older ones we have trouble with all the huts.At least we have quite a lot of room and some large fields.We take children aged from 5 to 11yrs.,the High School from 11 to 16yrs.then they go to the Upper School in Sudbury.There is also a church-linked Primary School in Hadleigh - St.Mary's.
